short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitter badge to display percent of viewers that have interacted with a tweet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitter can be a dumpster fire sometimes.

It's important that when sifting through all of the arguments and insults we don't lose our sense of perspective and get ourselves down with the state of people and the world.

This tool serves as a small reminder for how few of twitter's users actually interact with the tweets they see.

It provides a simple fourth widget to all of the tweets and replies on your timeline, which shows of all the people who viewed a tweet, what percentage either retweeted, liked or replied to the tweet itself. That's it.

Remind yourself that no matter how crazy a tweet or take may be, those who agree/disagree/care in any sense of the word represent only a fraction of all the eyes that have seen it.
